phone-invalid: Not a valid {{countryName}} mobile phone number
name: Name

message.no-event: Sorry, we couldn't find that CodeDay.
message.promo-fully-used: Promo code has been fully used.

error.total-changed: The total changed since the page was loaded (this usually means a discount expired), and you were NOT charged. The new total is {{currencySymbol}}{{price}}. Please refresh the page.

workshop-apply.title: CodeDay {{region}} Workshop Submission
workshop-apply.heading: Want to host a workshop?
workshop-apply.body: Your workshop can be about technology, art, music, or anything else that interests you. Students are encouraged to submit. (You don't have to be an expert!)

form.confirm-alert: Submitted! We'll get back to you by email as soon as we can.

topic.question: What do you want your workshop to be about?

awards.heading: Win an award, even if you're new!

difficulty.heading: Difficulty (for you)
difficulty.body: CodeDay isn't about showing off. Push yourself to try something new!

creativity.heading: Creativity
creativity.body: Work with other attendees to build a fun project with original art, design, music, voice acting, or story.

explainer.heading: Here's how CodeDay works:
explainer.subheading: (You don't need to be a coder to have fun. Artists, musicians, writers, and actors are especially welcome!
steps: We'll help you as you need it.

schedule.heading: Schedule
schedule.no-schedule: The schedule hasn't been announced yet

studentQuotes.heading: Welcome to our friendly & creative community of <highlight>50,000+ students</highlight> who have made <highlight>10,000+ projects!</highlight>

theme.heading: The theme is...
theme.guess-cta: Send your guesses to @codeday_org on Instagram for a chance to win a prize.
